text: Kirkota was a town of ancient Cilicia inhabited during Byzantine times. Its name does not occur in ancient authors but is inferred from epigraphic and other evidence. Its site is located near Kızıldere in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cilicia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Adana Province
title: Kirkota
